mapper.insert: insert into tbl_leave sets(pk_leave_no, fk_member_no, leave_reason, leave_date) values (leave_seq.nextval, to_number(#{fk_member_no}), #{leave_reason}, sysdate)
insert into tbl_charge sets(pk_charge_no, fk_member_no, charge_price, charge_regdate, charge_commission) values (cha_no.nextval, #{fk_member_no}, #{charge_price}, sysdate, #{charge_commission})
mapper.update: update tbl_member set member_point = member_point + #{point_insert} where pk_member_no = #{fk_member_no}
